page.seo-title: Grow a Garden Calculator | The Most Accurate Profit Tool
page.seo-description: The definitive Grow a Garden calculator for precise crop value and profit calculation. Features real-time data, full mutation support, and live trackers to maximize your Sheckles.

hero.title: Grow a Garden Calculator
hero.subtitle: Stop guessing. Start profiting. Get precise, real-time crop values to maximize every single harvest.

problemSolution.title: Tired of Under-Selling Your Hard Work?
problemSolution.description: The Grow a Garden economy is complex. Between mutations, friend bonuses, and fluctuating weights, it's easy to sell a prize crop for a fraction of its true worth. Our Grow a Garden calculator removes all guesswork, ensuring you get the maximum value you deserve, every time.
problemSolution.solutionTitle: The Ultimate Advantage for Every Farmer.

features.title: An Unmatched Set of Features
features.description: We built this Grow a Garden calculator with one goal: to be the most accurate and comprehensive tool for Grow a Garden players.

items.title: Precision Value Calculation
items.description: Grow a Garden calculator uses the exact in-game formulas for base value, weight, and bonuses, providing you with the most accurate sale price possible.

items.title: Full Mutation Support
items.description: Easily select any combination of mutations (Golden, Shocked, Wet, etc.) and our calculator will automatically apply the correct multiplicative stacking.

items.title: Integrated Friend Boost
items.description: Use the simple slider to factor in your friend bonus and see the full potential of a collaborative harvest before you even sell.

items.title: Instant Search Database
items.description: Our complete, image-rich database of all crops, including rare and event items, lets you find what you need in seconds.

items.title: Live Weather & Shop Trackers
items.description: Gain a strategic edge by planning around real-time weather events and knowing the current shop inventory without being in-game.

items.title: Fully Mobile Responsive
items.description: Calculate values on the go. Our entire site is optimized for a seamless experience on your phone or tablet.

howItWorks.title: Get Your Crop's Value in 3 Simple Steps

steps.title: Go to the Grow a Garden Calculator
steps.description: Quickly find any crop using our searchable dropdown menu with images.

steps.title: Enter the Details
steps.description: Input the crop's weight and check off all of its mutations.

steps.title: See the Instant Value
steps.description: Get the precise Sheckle value instantly, ready for you to make the most profitable sale.

socialProof.title: Why Top Farmers Rely On Grow a Garden Calculator

testimonials.quote: This is the only calculator I trust. The mutation stacking is perfect and the live trackers are a game-changer for planning my harvests.
testimonials.author: PixelFarmer_Pro

testimonials.quote: I realized I was losing thousands of Sheckles by guessing values. This tool paid for itself in one harvest. An absolute must-have for any serious player.
testimonials.author: SheckleHunter

questions.q: How do you guarantee the accuracy of this Grow a Garden calculator?
questions.a: Our system is directly synchronized with the official game's data and formulas. We have automated checks that run after every game update to ensure our values are always 100% aligned with what you see in-game.

questions.q: Are event-specific crops and mutations included?
questions.a: Yes. Our database is updated the moment a new event starts, including any new crops, gear, or temporary mutations, so you're always prepared.

questions.q: What's the best way to use the live weather tracker?
questions.a: Use the tracker to log on just before a thunderstorm to maximize your chances of getting the extremely valuable 'Shocked' mutation on your crops.

questions.q: Is Grow a Garden calculator free?
questions.a: Yes, Grow a Garden calculator is free to use. We do not require any payment or signup to use our calculator.

finalCta.title: Ready to Maximize Your Profits?
finalCta.description: Bookmark this page now and make it your go-to tool for every harvest. Stop leaving Sheckles on the table.

mutations.no-mutations-selected: No mutations selected â€¢ Click “Show Advanced” to configure

privacy.seo-title: Privacy Policy | Grow a Garden Calculator
privacy.seo-description: Learn how Grow a Garden Calculator collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our free crop value calculation tool.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Grow a Garden Calculator collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our free crop value calculation tool. We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about our data practices.

personal-data.title: Personal Data
personal-data.content: Grow a Garden Calculator does not collect, store, or process any personal information. We do not require registration, accounts, or any personal details to use our calculator.
items: No email addresses, names, or contact information
No account creation or user profiles
No personal identification data
No payment information (our tool is completely free)

service-data.title: Calculator Usage Data
service-data.content: We do not store any of the data you input into our calculator. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.
items: Crop selections and weight inputs are not saved
Mutation selections are not stored
Calculation results are not recorded
All data remains in your browser session only

technical-data.title: Technical Data
technical-data.content: We use Google Analytics to understand how our tool is used and to improve the user experience.
items: Page views and user interactions
Device type and browser information
Geographic location (country/region level)
Time spent on site and popular features

service-provision.title: Service Provision
service-provision.content: We use the limited technical data we collect to:
items: Ensure our calculator works properly across different devices
Optimize loading times and performance
Identify and fix technical issues
Provide accurate crop value calculations

service-improvement.title: Service Improvement
service-improvement.content: Analytics data helps us improve the Grow a Garden Calculator by:
items: Understanding which features are most popular
Identifying areas for improvement
Testing new features and layouts
Ensuring mobile compatibility and responsiveness

data-retention.title: Data Retention
data-retention.content: Since we don't store your calculator inputs, there's no personal data to retain. Google Analytics data is retained according to Google's standard policies:
items: Analytics data is automatically deleted after 26 months
You can opt out of analytics tracking using browser settings
No personal calculation data is ever stored by us
All calculator inputs are processed locally in your browser

data-sharing.title: Data Sharing
data-sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your information with third parties, except:
items: Google Analytics processes anonymous usage statistics
No personal information is shared with anyone
No calculation data is transmitted to external services
No marketing or advertising partnerships involve user data

data-protection-rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
data-protection-rights.content: Since we don't collect personal data, most data protection concerns don't apply. However, you have these rights:
items: Right to opt out of Google Analytics tracking
Right to use the calculator without any data collection
Right to clear your browser data at any time
Right to use ad blockers or privacy tools

content-generation-privacy.title: Calculator Privacy
content-generation-privacy.content: Your crop calculations are completely private:
items: All calculations happen in your browser locally
No crop data is sent to our servers
No calculation history is stored
Your farming strategies remain completely private

childrens-privacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrens-privacy.content: Our calculator is suitable for all ages. Since we don't collect personal information, there are no special privacy concerns for children using our tool. Parents can safely allow children to use the calculator without any data collection worries.

security-measures.title: Security Measures
security-measures.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect our service:
items: HTTPS encryption for all connections
Regular security updates and monitoring
No storage of sensitive user data
Secure hosting infrastructure

data-protection-practices.title: Data Protection Practices
items: Minimal data collection by design
No unnecessary tracking or cookies
Local processing of all calculations
Transparent privacy practices

international-data-transfers.title: International Data Transfers
international-data-transfers.content: The only data transfer involves Google Analytics:
items: Anonymous analytics data may be processed globally by Google
No personal information crosses international borders
Google Analytics complies with international data protection laws
You can opt out of analytics at any time

policy-updates.title: Policy Updates
policy-updates.content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally:
items: Updates will be posted on this page with a new date
Significant changes will be clearly highlighted
Continued use of the calculator indicates acceptance
We will always maintain our privacy-first approach

your-rights.title: Exercising Your Rights
items: Use browser privacy settings to control analytics
Clear your browser data to remove all traces
Use private/incognito browsing for maximum privacy
Contact us through the calculator if you have privacy concerns

contact-information.title: Contact Information
contact-information.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, you can reach us through the contact options available on the Grow a Garden Calculator website.

tos.seo-title: Terms of Service | Grow a Garden Calculator
tos.seo-description: Learn how Grow a Garden Calculator collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our free crop value calculation tool.
tos.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Grow a Garden Calculator, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: Grow a Garden Calculator is a free tool that helps players calculate crop values and optimize their farming strategies. Our service includes:
features: Accurate crop value calculations based on weight and mutations
Real-time calculation of friend bonuses and multipliers
Comprehensive database of crops and mutations
Free access to all calculation features

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: Grow a Garden Calculator does not require user accounts or registration:
requirements: No personal information needed to use the calculator
All features are immediately available to all users
No account management or password requirements

payment-terms.title: Payment Terms
items: Grow a Garden Calculator is completely free to use
No subscription fees, premium features, or hidden costs
No payment information is ever collected
All calculation features are available at no charge

refund-policy.title: Refund Policy
items: Since our service is free, no refunds are applicable
No charges are ever made for using the calculator
No premium features or paid upgrades exist
All users have access to the full feature set

acceptable-use.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable-use.content: You agree to use the Grow a Garden Calculator responsibly and not to:
restrictions: Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Attempt to interfere with or disrupt the service
Use automated tools to overload our servers
Reverse engineer or attempt to extract our calculation formulas
Misrepresent the source or accuracy of calculation results

service-ownership.title: Service Ownership
items: The Grow a Garden Calculator design and code are our property
Calculation algorithms and formulas are our intellectual property
Website design, layout, and user interface are protected
Our branding and logo are owned by us

user-rights.title: Your Rights
items: You may use the calculator for personal gaming purposes
You may share calculation results with other players
You may reference our tool in gaming discussions
You may not copy or reproduce our code or design

content-guidelines.title: Content Guidelines
requirements: Use accurate weight and mutation data for meaningful results
Understand that calculations are estimates based on current game mechanics
Verify important calculations before making significant in-game decisions
Report any calculation errors or bugs you discover

limitations.title: Service Limitations
limitations.content: Please understand these limitations of our service:
items: Calculations are based on current game mechanics and may change
We cannot guarantee 100% accuracy due to potential game updates
The service may occasionally be unavailable for maintenance
Internet connection is required to access the calculator

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us:
items: We do not store your calculation inputs
No personal information is required or collected
Only anonymous analytics are used to improve the service
See our Privacy Policy for complete details

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may restrict access to our service if:
reasons: You violate these terms of service
You attempt to abuse or overload our systems
You engage in activities that harm other users
Legal requirements necessitate restriction of access

updates.title: Service Updates
updates.content: We may update our service and terms:
items: Calculation formulas may be updated to match game changes
New features may be added to improve user experience
Terms of service may be updated as needed
Continued use indicates acceptance of updated terms

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited as follows:
items: The calculator is provided 'as is' without warranties
We are not liable for any in-game losses based on our calculations
We do not guarantee continuous availability of the service
Users are responsible for verifying calculation accuracy

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, you can reach us through the contact options available on the Grow a Garden Calculator website.

footer.description: The most accurate and comprehensive tool for Grow a Garden players. Calculate precise crop values with full mutation support.
